Yep, I would recommend that we have the `ign_create_docs()` macro check if a `docs/CMakeLists.txt` exists and call `add_subdirectory(docs)` if it does exist. If that file doesn't exist, then we use a default behavior (which currently all of the `ignition` projects that I'm familiar with have identical behavior).

That way, a project can customize its behavior if needed, but otherwise it's given some sane and useful behavior by default.
